unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions

Class TerranSiegeTank_SiegeMode_Reposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaGOAP.GoapAction
      • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.BaseAction
        • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.TerranSiegeTank_SiegeMode_Reposition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupableAction

    public class TerranSiegeTank_SiegeMode_Reposition
extends BaseAction
    TerranSiegeTank_SiegeMode_Reposition.java --- Action for a PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank_SiegeMode to reposition itself. This is necessary since otherwise the Unit would stay in SiegeMode since no other goal can be reached.
    Author:
    P H - 01.09.2017

        target - type: Null, no target needed since the Unit will morph itself with the previous TankMode action that is going to be queued before this action.

      • performGrouped

        public boolean performGrouped(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit groupLeader,
                              javaGOAP.IGoapUnit groupMember)
        Description copied from interface: GroupableAction
        Function for actually performing the action as a group. This function is only called when mirroring the leader's action towards the other members of it's group and is not called for the leader himself.
        Parameters:
        groupLeader - reference to the leader of the group.
        groupMember - the current Unit that is mirroring the leader's action.
        Returns:
        true if the action was performed successfully, false if not.

      • defineMaxLeaderTileDistance

        public int defineMaxLeaderTileDistance()
        Description copied from interface: GroupableAction
        Function for defining the max range for a Unit trying to join a leader's group.
        Returns:
        the max distance in TilePositions that a leader is allowed to be away from the Unit.
